articles.title: Congenital anomalies during the 2015–2018 Zika virus epidemic: a population-based cross-sectional study - BMC Public Health - BMC Public Health
articles.description: Background Congenital anomalies are associated with several clinical and epidemiological complications. Following the Zika epidemic onset in Latin America, the incidence of congenital anomalies increased in Brazil. This study aimed to determine the frequency …
